content.detailedDescription: 1.I was on lunch break at work and i always smoke a cig. on off time and look for the planets that are out at various times of the year.2.I am always on the lookout for shooting stars (some are quite spectacular).3.A shooting star.4. it was just like a fast moving shooting star but...It changed course and went behind the moon.5.I reacted with a "holy shit!" kind of attitude because i have been watching the sky since i was a small boy on camping trips with dad.Shooting stars do not change direction! afterwards i went in and ate lunch.6. like i said it went behind the moon and that was that.
content.summary: A "shooting star" passed from the right side of the moon to the left and then did a quick u-turn and shot back to the right and went behind the moon.

content.detailedDescription: This was the same occurance from the malibu siting.  but this was in the early mortning.  we saw the military helicpoters in the day the same day we experinced the helis that morning.  didnt see an object but just a flash in the sky as if somthing wanted to escape.  it was a blink of an eye flash.  very un-earthly
content.summary: Military helicpoters woke us up.  went outside.  house shaking rqdically.  it was circling very low.  saw a fglash in the sky.  helicpters left profusly.

content.detailedDescription: I had gone to zuma beach with my sister and some friends.  i had taken a walk to the south end of the beach.  they were playing guitars in a lifeguard tower about 1/4 mile north of my position.  i noticed a large light (1-2 feet in diameter) in the water just beyond the break-point of the surf.  it was absolutely stationary for a couple of minutes, then zoomed off to my right (north) lateral to the shore at about 30 mph.  i knew it could not be a person because it was able to remain stationary in the surf and because it moved so fast when it did move.  i asked my sister and friends if they had seen it when i got back to them, but they said they had not.  i have never heard of another water-borne observation like this and just wondered if there were others.  it made a very clear impression that i remember 30 years later.
content.summary: Round light in surf at zuma beach, moved laterally through water

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back seat of a moving car when i looked out the window and saw what looked like 2 very large stars some what overlaping each other. i noticed the bright light that had a bit of purple around it and it wasnt really moving but looked very close. i didnt really know what it was. my mom lost sight of it when it went above our car- way above- i could barely see it.And then the 2 lights combined into 1 bright lightit looked like a bright blimp with a black light on top and 2 briter lights below it and 1 light below the other 2.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw ufo while riding in a car after dark

content.detailedDescription: My xboyfriend and i were walking down my road. when we noticed a very bright object in the sky. the brightness glowed, and that's what caught our attention. when i first noticed it, i didn't think it was a plane at all. it was moving very slowly, and did not look like a plane. the object was moving very slowly, and it was hovering about 40 ft high above the marshland. then it started to move sideways, then straight up, then sideways again. it wasn't windy outside either. suddenly the object flew very fast over our heads, and made a loud humming sound as if it were trying to imitate a plane. but i knew this was not a plane. when i saw the object i ran back to my house to grab my video camera, then filmed it. apon doing so, my camera completely shut off, and the battery was fully charged. it was exciting to see such a thing. the object just flew so fast it vanished into sight, and we couldn't see it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: This ufo was oval-shaped. it was moving sideways, then up, then sideways again, and then up again. suddenly my camera went out.

content.detailedDescription:
I live about 5 miles south of molalla, oregon.
on nov 15th at  about 4:45pm i took a dozen or so pictures of mt hood. i took the pictures from my deck, facing northeast. i have a nikon coolpix 3100. it was set to a standard "scenery" mode.
there is one picture that has a curious "object" or "effect", i don't know what it is. i was hoping that you could tell me if it was a bug, (although i believe it was about 40 degrees at that time) or some other easily explained object.
i took three pictures within one minute and the object only shows up in the middle picture.
the object is above and to the right of the mountain only on image 009. it looks like a stick
content.summary: Unknown object appears in photo

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out back of my fire station smoking when i notice very bright and pulsing lights that seemed to hang in the same place longer than it should have. i assumed it was either a apd or starflight helo conducting operations over the city.  the object hovered for appox. 3 to 4 mins. due east of my station with very bright lights and then moved to the north about 5 degrees. at this time i went to my pickup to get my binos to get a closer look.  at this time i also noticed one plane east and one overhead on final to abia and used them to gage the objects size. the then begain to move south and the lights had diminished in brightness to white penpoint lights.  i then noticed a red and possibly a green strobe light.  at this time i had the object under observation with my binos. as the object moved south it banked and i observed white lights at the points of a triangle shaped object with white lights between the points and one in the middle of the triangle and also still observed a red and green light within the triangle shaped. the object continued to move south out of my sight behind some trees.  i notice no sound along with this sighting.  it should be noted my location is in the abia flight path and less than 300 yards from a major freeway. i really thought this was a helicopter until noticed the shape, lights and no/slow movement.  the hight of the object was appox. 10 to 20 degrees off the horizon.
content.summary: Possible ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: I was with some friends in my backyard. we were throwing around a football. i looked up and saw a silver color streak through the sky. first my friends thought it was a plane but it had a hypnotizing hold on us. we must have stared at it for 3 minutes or so. the object didn't perform any acrobatics. it mainly remained at a reasonable height and speed. we all kept staring at it until it went past our view. the thing that struck me most is that it looked like an eye.The kind you usually see in the egyptian hieroglyphs.
content.summary: Silver vehicle cruising through sky, hypnotizing and attractive

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog with a friend.  i saw something that was too colorful and moving too quickly to be a satellite.  i asked her to tell me what she thought it was.  we concluded that it had to be a ufo.  it was close enough for me to distinguish the light pattern. there was another one at a higher elevation, but it was so far that the blinking lights could not be made out.  we looked at it for about 20 minutes.  i walked back to my house and came out again.  it was closer in proximity, but had stopped moving. it was huge and shaped like a rounded oval. it was a mindboggling experience. i never thought i'd get to see something like that in the middle of los angeles. i didn't lose sight of the object.  it became stationary and so i went inside. i would have taken a picture of it if my cameras battery had not been dead.
content.summary: It was moving slowly.  it was like a jelly fish.  red, green and white blinking lights.
While outside smoking a woman observed two, rapid moving, green/gray ovoid spheres cross the nightsky before vanishing as they maneuvered out of view.

content.detailedDescription:
I can't remember if i awoke in the middle of the night or if i was having problems getting to sleep, but while in bed i looked out my 2nd story bedroom window towards the sky to stargaze.  i noticed what looked like a star moving slowly...Up for a while, to pause.  to the right, to pause.  always moving slowly though.  up, down, side to side, and diagonal movements were seen.  closing one eye and keeping my window as a point of steadiness, i kept watching for a while feeling very emotional and unsure what i was really seeing.  i compared its distance to other stars nearby and was positive it was indeed moving.  afraid the object would leave, i was fearful to get out of bed to wake my sister and my mom.  quickly i jumped out of bed to gently wake my sister in her bed on the other side of our bedroom.  after she saw it and started to get emotional with tears, i told her to get our mom in the next bedroom.  she didn't know what to tell her, so i told her to just tell her i wanted her to come here.  sleepy, but not pissed off, my mom came in.  i told her to lay down with me and look up there (pointing). of course at this point the ufo was still there, but was paused and i was starting to feel like an idiot.  then it started to move again after my mom had been watching for about 45 seconds.  i asked her if she saw "it".  she said she did.  the three of us all squeezed onto my bed and watched it for a while, dumbfounded and with watering eyes.  my mom said she'd seen one before- years ago when she lived in arizona.  my mom and i walked my little sister into my mom's room.  the two of them went to bed together.  when i returned to my own bed, it was gone.  i was disappointed i'd missed it leaving, or whatever it was going to do next. 

[i was 15 yrs old, sister was 10, mom was 32]
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw ufo while i was in bed.  i woke my sister and mom up to see it.

content.detailedDescription: I had met an olod university friend at the hotel he was staying in my home town. i had one beer in the hotel bar before we left to go to a night club. outside the hotel,it was a beautifull summer night and the sky was totally clear.Visability of the stars was excellent so i looked up to see the stars and from my peripheral vision caught sight of something moving very fast. my instant thought was that it was a satellite ( i have seen many of these), but instantly realised that it was not. the objects were moving far to fast and there were five of them in formation. the objects were star like with a red colour. they were at a great altitude and travelled across the entire sky within 5 seconds. they were in a straight line flying side by side, until they reached the other side of the sky, where they broke off from this formation and begun to weave in and out of each other before dissappearing vertically in different directions into the night. the whole episode lasted between 5 and 10 seconds. i called to my friends who were laughing and joking and told them what i had seen, however they thought i was winding them up and dismissed me. i spent the rest of the night trying to evaluate what i had seen, and form some kind of rational explanation. this process continued for a further two days. i considered military aircraft but these objects moved across the sky at least 10 times faster than any aircraft i have seen and the aerobatics that were performed before they disappeared were completly out of the question for a conventional fighter jet in my opinion. i resolved that i needed some form of explanation from someone, but bearing in mind my friends reaction, i was a little reluctant to say the least. i looked through the local phone book and foung a local observitory that listed itself as a local ufo group. i decided to call them anonymously. the person that answered the call seemed to be less than serious about what i was reporting and i felt that he was not taking me seriously and perhaps thought i was some sort of crank. i decided not to pursue the matter further. since that time  have never forgot what i saw that night, and everytime i look up at the stars, it is the first thought in my mind. last night i was watching tv and saw a program about a ufo sighting in the 1980's at an airforce base in norwich in the uk, and decided that now the internet is so widely used i would begin to make some enquiries for some form of explanation, without feeling ridiculed. i thank you for reading of my brief encounter and hope you may be able to offer some possible explanations, but i am also aware that if you offer some explanations, it may just pose more questions for me, if they do not fit completely with my experience.
content.summary: 5 red star like lights travelling across the sky at altitude in parrallel, then breaking off moving erratically before disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my backyard with my 115mm refractor telescope with 22mm eyepiece aimed at betelgeuse in 
the constellation orion. i started randomly searching just to the east and south of betelgeuse when the ufo 
entered my field of vision. it was moving in a south / southeast direction. it was not a satellite. i see 
satellites almost every night when i'm observing but this object was too large to be a satellite. at first i 
thought it was an airplane as the size was about right but it had no collision lights. the shape appeared to 
be almost perfectly square. it was not revolving, spinning, or rotating. it did not make any noise that i could 
here. the sky was fairly dark but the ufo stood out because it was slightly lighter in color. it was not shiny 
or reflective. it was moving about as fast as a commercial plane but it could not have been one- it was 
definitely square or slightly rectangular. i followed it with my telescope until it disappeared behind some 
trees.
content.summary: Ufo seen from orange county, ca

content.detailedDescription:
A dont seen the ufo self.A have to succes now the ufo-fall by people to people without something some can be danger for me.This is only of the information whas the ufo-fall its:
they on the ground some have seen the ufo have the name nicklas,nicklas,jonatan.Five people four older criminals and one young five yers old only boy on the ground in the park saw the ufo.But not first mayby.The ufo landed in allen park between the trainroad thieer and the self town the houses.The soucer landed in the part of the park allen park thieer longest from the biggest road.You can see a photo of allen park on google earth.The soucer whas for the two girls grey light very to the color and very dark with the colorbrightness.The hole soucer lighting yellow 4-5 lux.The soucers lamps green dont lighing.The soucer have dont wheels.Can being stolen from two inf

I  was at home in my driveway locking my car when i looked up at the clear stary sky and seen a cigar shaped copper looking object. it seemed to go into another demention because the front of the object started disappear.Then it was gone in about 3 to 5 seconds. during the sighting i was excited because my son and i had seen a ball of light and two balls of light dropped from the bottom of it. this was in 1980 when we lived in florida.
content.summary: Seen  a  cigar  shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out on the patio to get some fresh air, and it was very quite. all of a sudden i hear a oscillating, whirring sound, like something that is small and rapidly rotating, almost like the sound a boomerang makes, without any engine noise, maybe 50 feet up at the most, traveling 30-40mph. the judging by the sound, the object was going straight from the north to the south. whatever it was it was below the clouds judging by the sound which was direct and sounded very near as it passed overhead. i looked up as it went by, but i did not see a thing. it seems like i should have seen it, since the underside of the clouds where fairly bright, lit by the reflection of the mission viejo's mercury vapor lights. i remember thinking, why don't i see anything? the sound of the object was very mechanical, i am very familiar with all types of night birds such as owls or bats, and i can tell you this did not at all sound like a bird. as i indicated earlier, the oscillating nature of the sound made it seem like a boomerang rotating very fast, but the path and nature of the sound was straight and steady as it passed overhead, and i could hear it continuing at the same speed until it passed out of hearing range to the south.
content.summary: I heard (but did not see) an oscillating, whirring sound, like something that is small and rapidly rotating, almost like the sound a boomerang makes, without any engine noise, maybe 50 feet up at the most, traveling 30-40mph, from n to s.

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting was almost 2-1/2 years ago. the details i describe are as accurate as i can be because i wrote down the event as soon as it happened. 

i was in my backyard with my 8" telescope observing the ring nebula in lyra. as i positioned my telescope toward lyra, i noticed to the east something blocking out several stars in cygnus.  when taking a better look i saw a cylinder shaped object, dark gray or black finish moving overhead. as the object moved west i had a very good look when it was near the constellation hercules.

my first thought was that it is a blimp but there was no gondola, rudder, fins or lights nor did i see any engines or wings  and the object was totally
silent. it was following an east to west path directly overhead.The time from when i first saw the object to when it went out of sight over a hill where i live was about 2 minutes. 

the object made no turns and i am guessing the altitude was 
around 2000 ft.

my reaction was to go in the house for my camera but realized there was no film in it. so i observed  until it  went over the hill. i have been observing the sky  off and on for many years and this is the first time ever seeing a ufo. i was excited and would have liked more time to watch.
content.summary: Slow dark cylinder  in a clear night sky

content.detailedDescription: I live in sevier county tennessee near a small community called chestnut hill and on 1/4/06 at approx. 8:18am (est) i was out on my front porch about to sweep the leaves off when i glanced out at english mountain.  i noticed a very large oval disc-like silvery-white object, darker around the bottom and bottom edges, in the sky just above and south of english mountain.  immediately it looked strange because you could tell that it wasn't a cloud because of it's perfect oval disc-like shape.  from the couple of minutes that i was able to observe it there seemed to be some distinct geometrical patterns associated with it such as squares running from the far edges reaching inward towards the top of the object.  something similar to the latitude and longitude lines you'd see on a map.  the object wasn���t moving at first and then approx. 2 minutes or so, maybe less, the object began rising upward very slow and suddenly shot straight up and out of sight as if it winked out, simply disappearing.  when it shot straight up it punched thru a thin layer of cloud cover leaving a hole in the clouds exactly the same shape as the object itself.  there also appeared to be a wisp of smoke or cloud vapor of some sort that seemingly trailed the object as it broke thru the clouds.  english mountain is directly south of my home and it appeared that the object was somewhat further south of english mountain and not directly over it.  from my standpoint i would estimate that the object was 1 to 2 miles from my location and higher than english mountain which is 3600 ft.  that would make the object very large in diameter if i was able to discern the lines and shape from that distance.  as soon as i saw that the object left the hole in the clouds with the smoke trail i went inside and got my camera and took these photos which were taken within the first 3 to 5 minutes after the hole was made.  the photos are still on my digital camera and have not been erased.
content.summary: I live in sevier county tennessee and on 1/4/06, approx. 8:18am (est) i noticed a very large oval silvery-white object in the sky near my home.

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside front door of house, noticed three very bright lights that were stationary up in the sky to the west which immediately caught my attention. very unusual. two small bright red lights apart from each other, one lower and one away and above the other. did not form straight line between the two if drawing a line. one large very bright white light south of the two red lights and closer to the lower red light. bottom red light blinked on and off, then dimmed out. bright white light just blinked out after lower red light went out. bottom red light illuminated again then dimmed out. upper red light flickered then dimmed out. almost knew i had seen them. incident lasted about 30 seconds. altitude seemed to be between 25,000-50,000 feet. no movement. was not aircraft.
content.summary: Two small bright red lights, one large white light stationary. all lights dimmed out within seconds of each other.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were outside at mountain pointe highschool. i was looking at planes in the sky when i noticed that there was a huge black missle looking object in the sky. i could not see any wings. from where i was standing it seemed to be smooth like a missile.It had a smoke trail behind it like an ordinary jet but slightly bigger. when i compared it to other planes flying at the same altitude, i decided that it had to be at leat 40 times bigger looking than the jets. it was moving southwest at a fairly high rate of speed. i lost sight of the object when it flew out of seeing range.
content.summary: Long missle like object

content.detailedDescription:
Please note: this is not a joke

i have a "professional" picture taken a few hours before a wedding at a church in ashland, ohio. there is a vapor trail coming from the sky, then around a tree, and the disc shaped object (with markings) seems to be hovering above the church with something that looks like a very large insect floating next to a tree. multiple church people seem to be very afraid of the picture when shown. i have given up on a spiritual answer due to these responses. i am willing to privately show the picture to someone who might be able to help us identify what is going on. i am a 50 year old conservative business executive that has never seen anything like this before.

chris schneider
northwest columbus, ohio (dublin)
w) 800-991-0048
h) 614-873-6410
content.summary: I have a professional picture of 1)vapor trail from sky 2) disc shaped object with markings hovering over a church, and more.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a small child at the time, and like most 7 or 8 year olds in the midwest, out playing in the neighborhood. at some point i notice, up in the sky at some distance but somewhat overhead (making the object appear both high up and rather large to me), a disc shaped object. i remember at the time realizing even at that age that what i was seeing was completely unusual. 

neighbors were summoned from their houses, people gathered and were in a vacant field (still vacant and viewable on google earth @ approx. 423 putnam st. fort wayne in. it is the open lot nearest this point at a corner) to point and stare up in the sky toward the south east, at what i can only describe as a "saucer" with a row of multi colored lights (i believe orange,red,blue,purple w/others a possibility) that seemed to change over a short period of time. not quite what we see today as the "classic disc" but rather with a row of colored windows through the center. definately thinner height wise than wide. 

the object hovered for some time although i don't recall losing sight of it, because people were awaiting a reply from someone who had gone inside to contact the local ft. wayne airport. when the neighbor emerged he was told that there wasn't anything on radar but that there was apparently a "weather balloon" over the skies of ft. wayne that day. the adults milling about the whole time did not for a minute believe there was a weather balloon or anything else they had ever seen in the afternoon sky that day.

these were relatively well educated, middle class people who all believed they were seeing something unusual. this was absolutely an "event" in my little neighborhood. these people were not the type who would gather as a group. i never before or after saw any of my neighbors behave this way. 

although it has been many years since this sighting, it stands out as one of my oldest and deepest memories. my family recalls me telling them of the occurence. unfortunately i have never had the nerve to contact the neighbors who might still be alive to ask their version of the story. not sure how i would approach the subject with them even if i could find any of them today. 

my dates/times are approximate, it was just too long ago to be certain the date. the above recounting is correct to the best of my memory. i have not since then, ever seen anything in the skies that i believed to be unusual.
content.summary: Circular with a row/rows of multi colored lights through middle

content.detailedDescription: I was driving a semi east bound on rt. 76 this was in the fall of 1990. i first noticed the craft to the left of me flying at the same speed i was driving. i wasn't sure what it was. it had three dim lights. it was there for a short time and then gone and then back and then gone again.I desided to stop and go to the bathroom along side of my truck. as i was standing there between the tractor and trailer. i looked up and there was the ship. i finished what i was doing and walked arround to the front of the truck and looked at it while it was looking at me.The ship was black. it looked in a way transparent but you couldn't see through it. the way the ship was built it looked like it was structured from the inside out. it had areas on the bottom that dropped down instead of a flat surface. the front was ovel. the second level was set back a little and filled the whole body of the ship the third level had a small dome also set back. it looked like it had a window at the front of it. when the ship moved it went ouer the top of me and i could see the back as it was departing. the back, to me resembled an old appartment building with steps and different landings. it had odd shapes at the rear of the ship. the ship when it flew off there was no sound or wind . during the time it was stopped i didn't see any lights. the ship had to be antigravity. when it flew off it stayed at the same level as the ground. the ground is hilly in that area and the ship bounced up and down with the ground level as it flew off. it's flight was from the north to south direction. it took off slow and it's speed elivated to like a flash of light in a matter of about 6 seconds and then it was gone. i didn't report this when i saw it. in about the year 2000 i got a computer.One day i looked up ufo's and saw a picture of one that looked pretty much like what i had seen.I did a write up of what i had seen but never heard back from my report. i looked today for a picture but i didn't find one.Also i talked to a worker at a delivery in michigan i was making about a week after i saw the ship and he said he had seen the same thing once. if i can be of more help let me know. thanks.
content.summary: Ovel front flat rear 3.5 stories

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday, january 7, 2006 ��� about 5:30 or 5:45 am
location: a sheepdog trial at a ranch on rt. 67, about 500 yards north of intersection with poway rd, poway ca.  hills rise about 5 to 10 degrees over the ���horizon���, depending on azimuth.
weather:  clear with scattered, thin clouds.  waxing half moon.

i was caring for my dogs & absent-mindedly star gazing.  i noticed a horizontal row of 4 ���stars���, the row about ��� to 1 degree long (wider than my pinky fingernail at arms length).  as far as i could tell the formation was stationary.  the left-most (west) one was the brightest (maybe 2nd magnitude, comparable to the main stars in ursa major).  they seemed to be scintillating strongly, perhaps more so than the normal stars.  after ten seconds or so, the brightest one faded by about 1 magnitude & the next one (left to right) brightened to about the same brightness as the first.  i know there is no such ���constellation��� in this part of the sky, especially one composed of variable stars.  otherwise, i probably would not have noticed it; nothing was changing fast enough to grab a person���s attention.  the elevation was about 30 degrees (3 fists at arm���s length), near the edge of a cloud.  i turned around to extinguish my lantern (maybe 20 seconds?) & when i looked back, the formation was either gone or behind the cloud.  when the cloud passed a few minutes later, there was no such formation.  the color of all 4 ���stars��� was white.  there were no flashing red or green lights that would suggest an airplane or blimp.  there was no engine sound, or any other sound.  total duration of the sighting was 2 to 3 minutes.  as far as i can tell, the formation did not move during this time (the clouds moved).

the next morning at the same time, there was no such formation, which did not surprise me.  by standing in the same place that i was when i saw the formation & referencing telephone poles, mountains, etc., i guessed that the location was probably about 10 to 20 degrees ���west��� of polaris.

as far as i know i was the only person on site who was awake & outside at the time.  no dogs or livestock (sheep, cattle, horses, chickens were present) showed any unusual behaviors.
content.summary: Horizontal line of 4 2nd magnitude "stars" near polaris

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside my house. it was a bright cloudless sunny day, and i was following with my eyes a squirrel, bouncing around on the wall above me, when i noticed a very small white object moving high up in the sky behind it. it was moving smoothly like an aircraft. then suddenly, after going just a few degrees across the sky, it completely disappeared. i thought, oh well it is very high up, perhaps you can only see it when the sun shines at a particular angle. then i saw another suddenly appear in the same small area of the sky and do exactly the same thing. then another. their paths were sometimes in completely different directions. unfortunately i did not have any binoculars on me. as far as i remember, i did not see more than one at once, so i cannot be sure it was not all the same craft or object. all of them were in just the same very small portion of the sky above me, and all just disappearing. if these were normal craft, or even military craft, why were they all flying so close to each other in different directions?. or was it a single craft?. i did not see anything that did not appear to be moving in anything other than a straight line, although i did not see anything go that far before it suddenly faded out.

the objects were all very small and appeared to be very high up, and i believe they were all white. they were too small to really resolve any features on them, but i remember when i saw the last one, it definitely appeared to have some kind of structure, rather than being amorphous. 

i think each moving object was visible for perhaps 2 seconds before disappearing. i saw around half a dozen of them do this serially, going in different directions, within a small area (a few degrees) of the sky, over a total period of about 30 seconds to a minute. it was a bright sunny day, with no clouds in the sky, and there was nothing i could see in the sky that would obscure the objects' trajectories.

i followed several high up aircraft after this, and you could easily see their reflection in sunlight as they travelled right across the sky.

perhaps there is some explanation in terms of very bright satellites, iridium flares, a strange clustering of meteors all going in different directions and visible in daylight, or just a bunch of reckless miltary aircraft that are all clustered in one spot, and pretty much invisible except when sunlight is in exactly the right direction?.  none of these ideas make a lot of sense.

i have wondered if there is some perfectly normal explanation for this, but i cannot think of one. i dont recall seeing anything quite like this ever before.
content.summary: Multiple disappearing craft / objects

content.detailedDescription:
1.Object moving slowly across view finder,i feel it has a part of the other two but didn't do much.Blinking real slow
2.Next object comes up from the bottom real fast then goes down fast, moves up real fast, to the right and then to the left. then goes out of to the left real fast.
3.Object comes in from the right blinking really fast it seems to be going up a little. then the object shot down in a blink of a eye,then shot back up in a blink of a eye, then down at a angle to the left and went out of frame to the left.  (2nd object was blinking real fast also)
content.summary: Dot moving across camcord viewing moving slow then fast up then down very fast.

content.detailedDescription: Two friends and i stopped at another friend's house in rural parkers prairie. i was in the back seat of the car. a girl in the front said, "see! there it is! that's what i have been seeing!" there was a bright, round light not far above the silo. the girl we were picking up jumped in the car, frightened because she also had seen the object. we drove down a gravel road and the ufo dropped straight down from the sky and began to follow our car. we drove approximately 8(?) miles to my house traveling mostly on gravel. the roads were very icy and we could not drive fast. the object continued to follow us the entire way along-side the car. it was very low and very close to us. when there were trees along the side of the road the ufo moved up above them, then would dip back down beside us. then we got to a highway (hwy. 14, douglas county). we turned onto it and the object moved behind us. a very large beam of light came down out of it, illuminating a field on the left side of the road, then moved onto the highway behind us. it was strange, almost as if something made an audible click inside my brain when the light came out. by this time we were all hysterical. the object lagged behind us, then started to gain. another car came over the hill in front of us and the object was literally gone in a split second. i have seen the ufo several times since. it would come to my home (where we were headed in the car) and it would hover outside where i could see it from my pillow in bed. i would fall asleep when it was not there, then feel as though someone was staring at me. when i would open my eyes it was there! the object changed shapes depending on the shape of the moon. sometimes it was round, sometimes a sliver. one time it was like a circle cut precisely in half. after several weeks of seeing the object outside my window, i called law enforcement. i wanted someone else besides family members to see it. when i picked up the phone to call, the white ufo turned yellow. i dialed the number and it turned orange. when i told the dispatch that there was a ufo the object turned deep red in color! i was too frightened to go outside to take a picture as suggested because i thought it might put out another beam like before and zap me or something! the object hovered for several minutes, getting lower and lower. seconds before the squad car drove by to check it out it was gone! i have seen it off and on in the years since, as recent as this summer in garfield and leaf valley, mn. i often wonder if i have ever had more contact with them than i remember. when i moved to long prairie, mn i saw it there a few times, and once when i was in osakis, mn.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Rather small (like a vehicle size), round, very bright, with a beam (helicopter-like floodlight)

content.detailedDescription:
I was hanging out with some friends. just walking.

the bright blue light

a plane. but it went way to fast.

it was a very bright blue light. going really fast. just in a straight line. i have never seen anything in the sky go that fast. no noise. i was headed in the direction of the willow grove naval air station. 

i asked my friend and he said he saw something out of the coner of his eye. 

the houses and trees.
content.summary: A bright blue light

content.detailedDescription: I live right across from the perkiom valley library so i was returning a book that was over due.  i noticed a huge moving light in the sky about 30 yards away from me.  must of been atleast 3 football fields long, huge. i can only image how big it is up close, it was huge. there were three rows of lights.  top bottom and middle. top and bottom row was plain yellow lights, middle row was an intense red shining light.  very intense light nearly blinded me.  and strangly a big gust of wind was blowing.  it was a wierd shape to it, like a star- like triangle, cylinder shape. i didnt get a chance to get my camera, but by the time i went back outside, it was still moving behind some trees.  i belive some other people saw it too.  2 or 3 cars pulled over.  i have seen others in the past but not as huge as this was was. sorry for not having picture.
content.summary: Atleast 3 football fields long, red lights center, very intense light

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back sheet of a car my dads car them i look out the widow too see hal cosa war to the hsose [not good speper]i then see a green light geting biger and biger i was so sonked too knok that other life was out there[i bevaed in alians]i lsot sight of the ufo we a red light aperd
content.summary: Green
